info.name: SPF Record - Detection
author: rxerium
info.description: An SPF TXT record was detected

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 2129
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 2129
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:mx.ovh.com -all"

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 2129
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 2129
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:mx.ovh.com -all"

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 10860
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 10860
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	60	IN	SOA	dns104.ovh.net. tech.ovh.net. 2024090900 86400 3600 3600000 60

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 8348
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 8348
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	dns104.ovh.net.
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	ns104.ovh.net.

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22046
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22046
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	MX	100 mx3.mail.ovh.net.
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	MX	1 mx1.mail.ovh.net.
facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	MX	5 mx2.mail.ovh.net.

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Cache-Control: s-maxage=31536000, stale-while-revalidate Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; connect-src * https://*.gouv.fr; font-src 'self'; media-src 'self'; img-src * 'self' data: https:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://stats.beta.gouv.fr *.posthog.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'self' data:; frame-ancestors 'self'; base-uri 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; form-action 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; block-all-mixed-content ; upgrade-insecure-requests ; frame-src 'none'; Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy: credentialless Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: cross-origin Date: Thu, 12 Dec 2024 11:46:16 GMT Etag: "10c8zq3g8lnmis" Permissions-Policy: fullscreen=(), display-capture=(), camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=() Referrer-Policy: no-referrer, strict-origin-when-cross-origin Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Vary: RSC, Next-Router-State-Tree, Next-Router-Prefetch, Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Nextjs-Cache: HIT X-Request-Id: dc953e4a-3b41-4da9-9321-6f4fac348a42 X-Request-Id: dc953e4a-3b41-4da9-9321-6f4fac348a42 X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Facili-TACCT

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 503 Service Temporarily Unavailable Connection: close Content-Length: 190 Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Thu, 12 Dec 2024 11:48:14 GMT Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 X-Request-Id: 878dec46-fbfb-4597-8c1d-8f6f8f4b83e1 503 Service Temporarily Unavailable

503 Service Temporarily Unavailable

nginx
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://facili-tacct.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
